dataSet.name: DataSet1

calculatedField.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN ANSWER = 1 THEN "ДА" WHEN Answer = 0 OR Answer IS NULL THEN "НЕТ" END
CASE WHEN Sum(BaseUnitQty) >= 1 THEN "ДА" WHEN Sum(BaseUnitQty) = 0 OR Sum(BaseUnitQty) IS NULL THEN "НЕТ" END

calculatedField.expression: Case when sum(BaseUnitQty) = 0 then 0 else sum(PlanFactQty) / sum(BaseUnitQty) * 100 end
Case when BaseUnitQty = 0 Then Null Else Answer End
Case when BaseUnitQty = 0 then 0 else PlanFactQty / BaseUnitQty * 100 end
CASE WHEN VW = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

totalField.expression: CASE WHEN PlanFactQty Is NULL THEN 0 ELSE Sum(PlanFactQty) END
CASE WHEN BaseUnitQty IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE BaseUnitQty END
